reviews.review: Many reviews complain that it doesn't have the same spirit as #1. Yes, it doesn't feel like it was rebuilt from the same skeleton as its predecessor, which is what a lot of major movie franchises do, making revisits to a theme rather than continuations to a story, with new explorations. IMO, modeling #2 too closely after #1 would never work, it wouldn't be the same and would have ruined the mood for rewatching #1. by having a different direction and overall theme, it leaves frozen 1 as what most ppl want it to be left as: a timeless classic. u don't have to like it as much as or the same way as 1 - what's important is that it doesn't ruin the significance of its pilot by being a shallow thematic revisit. I wish I was a tween when I watched frozen and a young fellow just out of high school when I watched frozen 2. it would have felt perfectly right. same goes for the change in the music style. it's what I imagine my music taste growing from 13-19yo would be. I never thought I'd see the day weezer appears in a Disney movie soundtrack. I think 19 is a good age for getting curious about your dad's old records. with a lineup like weezer and panic at the disco, it doesn't look like this is going to be the usual album full of dubstep-flavoured-pop. again, a wise move. being that the songwriting team are the same ppl(or so I heard) this is like what a successful sophomore album would sound like. not a sad attempt at recreating  breakthrough hits(which rarely works) but an exploration of a more complex and nuanced style and different genres, with songs that are growers needing multiple listens in order to appreciate it better.
I didnt get to finish the movie since my kids started getting restless, but the first half was amazing! And I cant wait to get to finish it!
Tried to hard with the music and storyline, ending was good.
Didnt have the annoying ear worm song.
The movie was a little scary for the younger kids. The first one was much better.
It was ok. I thought there was to many songs and could've had a better story line.
The movie was great, seating and the space In between the aisles was too small.
It was great! My grandkids absolutely loved it.  Can't wait to buy it to add to our collection..
